title: The Incredible Physics of Simone Biles’ Yurchenko Double Pike

title: Amazon Has to Recall More Than 400,000 Dangerous Products
summary: Regulators found that Amazon is responsible for defective products sold by its third-party vendors—which include flammable pajamas, faulty carbon monoxide detectors, and hair dryers that could electrocute you.

title: The Purple Track at the 2024 Summer Olympic Games Has a Secret Ingredient
